response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that is truly unparalleled in its value and significance. This unique item is worth $1,500,000 to me, but I am extending this incredible chance to you at a special introductory price of $1,400,000. This is an exceptional deal considering the immense worth and quality of the product. I believe it would be a wise investment for you, given its potential to bring substantial returns or fulfill a specific need in your life. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I am looking forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1400000}
